CustomField.description: -Interact with customers on a frequent basis to obtain feedback about their experiences with HT -Emphasizes and holds HOD accountable for addressing service failures or potential service failures, and for developing innovative ways to exceed customer satisfaction -Develop strategic alliances with local govt/agencies, businesses, and customers -Anticipates needs of high profile customers & events to deliver a flawless service
CustomField.inlineHelpText: -Interact with customers on a frequent basis to obtain feedback about their experiences with HT -Emphasizes and holds HOD accountable for addressing service failures or potential service failures, and for developing innovative ways to exceed customer satisfaction -Develop strategic alliances with local govt/agencies, businesses, and customers -Anticipates needs of high profile customers & events to deliver a flawless service
CustomField.label: Client Management [GM]
